attributes.action: Does Tony Blair merit a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: The awarding of a Knighthood to Tony Blair, simply because he was a former Prime Minister is wrong to the majority of voters in the UK and begs the question why should former Prime Ministers become Knights just because of the job they were paid to do rather on  being outstanding in their role
attributes.background: Parliament to discuss whether Tony Blair merits a knighthood and should ALL former Prime Ministers become Knights just because it is customary

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed.
